task.title: Renaming Collections
task.shortdesc: You can rename collections in order to best represent the collected items.

context.p: You may want to rename a collection as your collection grows in order to better represent the items within it. It is not suggested to rename collections too frequently.

step.cmd: Select "Rename Collection" and type in the new name of the collection
step.info: Collections are sorted alphabetically in your library. You can use punctuation marks to sort collections to the top of the list.
